text: Ezɨ ia kamaghɨn damuan markɨ, ia kamaghɨn damu, ia zurara dughiabar ia vaghvagh Godɨn gumazamizir igharaziba ko ia, akar aghuim uari danɨng uarir akurvagh egh uan naviba gavgavim dar anɨng. Kamaghɨn arazir kuram tav gifaraghtɨ, a Godɨn gɨn zuir tuavim ateghan kogham. Godɨn Akɨnafarim ghaze, “Datɨrɨghɨn,” e fo, e datɨrɨghɨn ingangarir kam damuam.
